蠵字的基本解释

蠵
xī
〔蠵龟〕海产的大龟，身体长约一米，四肢呈桨状，吃鱼虾等，卵可食，龟甲可以入药。

蠵字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xī］
［《廣韻》户圭切，平齊，匣。］
［《廣韻》悦吹切，平支，以。］
即蠵龟，一种大龟。

蠵字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蠵； 康熙笔画：24； 页码：页1103第30
【唐韻】戸圭切【集韻】元圭切，?音攜。【說文】大龜也。以胃鳴。【玉篇】蟕蠵，似玳瑁而有文。【前漢·禮樂志】馮蠵切和疏寫平。【揚雄傳】抾靈蠵。互詳蟕字註。　又【博雅】地膽，靑蠵也。　又【韻會】宿名。　又勻規切。義同。　【集韻】亦作?。

蠵字的源字形

字源演变：

楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
蠵字的起名意思

暂无。

Loggerhead
Basic explanation of words
Loggerhead
xī
[Loggerhead Turtle] A large marine tortoise with a body length of about one meter and paddle-shaped limbs. It eats fish and shrimps. The eggs are edible, and the tortoise shell can be used as medicine.
Loggerhead
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xī］
["Guangyun" Hu Guiqie, flat, box. ]
["Guangyun" Yue blow cut, flat support, with. ]
The loggerhead turtle, a kind of big tortoise.
Loggerhead
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蠵; Kangxi Strokes: 24; Page Number: Page 1103 30
【Tang Yun】Gui Kei [Ji Yun] Kei Kei Yuan, with sound. [Said the text] Big tortoise also. Take the stomach sound. [Jade articles] 蟕蠵, like tortoiseshell but with text. [Former Han·Liyuezhi] Feng Zhuo cuts and sparsely writes. 【The Legend of Yang Xiong】Lingling. Mutual details of the word note.　[Bo Ya] Earth gall, 靑蠵 also.　[Rhyme Club] Name of the hotel.　Early cut again. The same meaning.　【Jiyun】also made?.
